name: Immortal Sword-Idle MMORPG
description:
Begin your unique journey in search of everlasting love and friendship in this magical, gorgeous, and fascinating City of Chang An.
Explore this magnificent Open World in any way you can imagine.

Follow us on socials for more latest information!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Immortal-Sword-104901081810329
Discord: https://discord.gg/eTV26SqzhY
If you have any issues regarding the game, please email us at:
Immortal@limegames.net

[Feast For The Eyes]
Take a stroll, hop on your mount, or spread your wings above the graceful lakes and appreciate the beauty and grandness of the world.

[Find your “The One”]
Fate is unfathomable and unpredictable, but with the advanced social system of Immortal Sword, you’ll find your true love, marry them, and nurture your essence of love with the baby system,

[Growth System]
Raise your pets, mount, and artifacts, and watch them grow stronger as you do.

[4 Classes, 8 Styles]
No matter what role you’d like to play in a team, here, you will definitely find a class that’s perfect for you.

[Fight Together]
You’re going to meet obstacles on your path, and some you can’t face alone, so join a guild or make one if you like.

[Cross Server PvP]
If you are an ambitious one, you can even challenge others through the Cross Server PvP system, and make your name known to the world.
